remarks: Condition for a set to be Diophantine (unpacking existential quantifier) (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)
statement:
eldioph $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ K e. ( ZZ>= ` N ) /\ P e. ( mzPoly ` ( 1 ... K ) ) ) -> { t | E. u e. ( NN0 ^m ( 1 ... K ) ) ( t = ( u |` ( 1 ... N ) ) /\ ( P ` u ) = 0 ) } e. ( Dioph ` N ) ) $.
$d K t u $.
$d N t u $.
$d P t u $.
